detail_desc: Short dress in cotton poplin with a large, frill-trimmed collar and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.

Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

Sun hat in a cotton weave with a scalloped trim and ties. Lined.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

detail_desc: Puffer jacket in quilted, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, detachable, fleece-lined hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a press-stud, and covered elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with appliqués and sewn-on ears. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fully lined swimsuit made partly from recycled polyester. Removable inserts and a frill trim that continues down the back.

Shorts in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and a narrow, ribbed trim around the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulder seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
